Reviews.Title: Excellent deal for Tracfone PIN from shopcell deals
Reviews.Author: Timothy Mc
Reviews.Content: Placed order (200 min. card was $29.99) over the weekend, was notified that order was mailed on Monday, then received Priority Mail package on Wednesday.  Instead of the usual Tracfone PIN card, there was an 8x11 sheet of paper with instructions and a label affixed to it with a Tracfone PIN printed on it.  Entered the PIN and a promo code into my phone and within a few seconds my phone beeped and the time increased for the correct amount of time.  Walmart charges almost $40 for these cards and then there are taxes and 911 fees, etc.  Even after paying $5.00 for Priority Mail, buying a PIN number online saved a good chunk of change.  Will do it again.

Reviews.Title: Great deal!
Reviews.Author: ChelleC "Chelle"
Reviews.Content: My son has a triple minute phone so with 200 minutes, I just filled his phone for the month. This is a great deal especially with a triple minute phone.

Reviews.Title: Tracfone
Reviews.Author: D. M. Miller
Reviews.Content: I was a little disappointed.  All I got was a piece of paper with the code on it, not an actual card.  They could have saved me postage and e-mailed the code.

Reviews.Title: shopcelldeals - This is NOT the card pictured
Reviews.Author: K. Horne
Reviews.Content: You receive a piece of paper with instructions and a PIN, no card.  Not a retail card that you would put under the xmas tree.

Reviews.Title: just a little glitch, but...
Reviews.Author: JDG
Reviews.Content: With taxes and tracfone onliine charges, this card would retail for about $42. so it's a great deal.  Two (sort of) problems though. It was sent USPS to:  (my Name) or CURRENT RESIDENT.  If this had wound up in the wrong box, I'd be out $32. Last Time I ordered it, I got a regular card, this time it was a xeroxed page with a Pin # sticker. Good news.. The pin # worked, and added the appropriate time for my plan. The second "problem" though, was that I must have tried at least 12 non-expired bonus codes before finding one that tracfone would accept.. Still, all told, It's still a great value, as the cards don't go on sale either retail or online.

Reviews.Title: robbed by tracphone
Reviews.Author: Drew
Reviews.Content: when they send you a welcome msg and one other phone msg when you first turn on you tracfone they charge you if you read the msg. they shouldn't take time away for system generated msg's.

Reviews.Title: Absolutely super product
Reviews.Author: James H.Connett
Reviews.Content: Would recommend this product to anyone  who is in the US occasionally on a regular basis.  Double minutes even include double calendar time 180 days instead of 90 days, 400 minutes instead of 200 minutes. Also, feature to call outside the US to other countries at the same rate as a local US call a big plus. Try it, you will like it!

Reviews.Title: Got just what I ordered.
Reviews.Author: FrankP8536
Reviews.Content: I ordered these cards for my girlfreinds phone. Bought them online instead of in the store because they we about $7.00 cheaper per card. I got two for her. Came in just a few days and work just fine when I activated them.

Reviews.Title: Hate to say it but this company is as close to a RipOff as any  I have dealt with
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: Did not work and TracPhone wasn't involved with it.What this company sent me was a non TracPhone print out of something with a non working pin number.I called Tracphone when I couldn't get the pin number to work and they said there's nothing they could do to help me.

Reviews.Title: Good value
Reviews.Author: James A. Keenan
Reviews.Content: The only down side of this purchase is that it takes days to get the card. If you are in a hurry, there are some other sellers who will send the code by e-mail right away. This time I ordered the others were not offering cards so I had to get this card and wait for it.

Reviews.Title: Easy
Reviews.Author: A. Elliott
Reviews.Content: Very easy to use. Worked perfectly. Go to the Tracfone website for a promo code to get 50 extra minutes until Dec. 26.

Reviews.Title: paper
Reviews.Author: AW Tondre
Reviews.Content: Was not happy that this product was just a piece of paper and not the actual card that was sent to me.

Reviews.Title: Happy with the Tracfone 200 Minutes and 90 days Service Purchase
Reviews.Author: Boca Raton, FL
Reviews.Content: I am happy with my purchase. I  did not have any issues or problems loading the minutes on my cell phone. It was quick and easy. It took me less than a minute to enter the PIN and get the minutes added on my phone. Will purchase again.

Reviews.Title: Tracfone minutes
Reviews.Author: J. H. Smith "John"
Reviews.Content: Add 200 minutes to your Tracfone. Some TracFones tripple minutes so you get 600 minutes with the right phone. Use coupon codes when purchasing minutes for even more free minutes. Just search on google for TracFone coupon codes. also enter minutes through your online account NOT THROUGH THE PHONE. The problem with the phone is that if you enter an invalid number from the minutes card (enter it wrong) TracFone will accept the number anyway and charge your account a second time for the minutes. That does not happen if you enter minutes online through your TracFone account. NEVER USE YOUR PHONE TO ADD MINUTES!!!

Reviews.Title: Less expensive than a major carrier
Reviews.Author: bench300at55 "jcc2c"
Reviews.Content: I added this to an inexpensive Tracfone with lifetime triple minutes at the end of June, 2013. It not only gave me a bonus of 50 minutes for a total of 650, but it also added time. Activation should have been good until the end of September. It ended up adding extra days so the time out ended up being the middle of November. That was almost 2 extra months. When my ATT contract obligation is fulfilled, I'm switching to Tracfone. Less expensive, they have Smart Phones available now and no spying by NSA if you don't register the phone.

Reviews.Title: Exactly as ordered
Reviews.Author: A. Good
Reviews.Content: I ordered this since I was running out of minutes and wasn't able to get to the store anytime soon. It came on time, and with my triple minute phone, is a HUGE bargain for someone like me who mostly texts and doesn't have many long conversations. I now have 600 minutes to spend over 3 months for $40 ($35 + $5 shipping).For me, this did come as a card. Honestly, I don't know why some people stress so much about what form it comes in. Its the same product regardless. This was super convenient and didn't cost me any more than Kroger or Walmart would have charged (even when counting in the price of shipping).

Reviews.Title: I had no problems
Reviews.Author: Ed C
Reviews.Content: Was easy to use and worked just like a real minutes card from a store.  What came was a sheet of paper with instructions and a PIN.

Reviews.Title: Tracfone 200 Minutes
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Arrived quickly. Good value for money. Does what it says on the can. Buy in combination with the double minutes for life card and it's even better value. Defo recommend.

Reviews.Title: TracFone 200 minutes
Reviews.Author: Katelyn
Reviews.Content: Just follow the instructions on the card or paper in my case for your phone and you will have your 200 minutes in no time. It is a very VERY simple procedure! In a way I do wish that they would switch back to just allowing the user to punch in his/her own minutes over the phone as was the case in the past, but the newer varities seem a bit different and I am less unfamiliar with due to the fact that I have an android phone on a Verizon plan. These minutes were a Father's Day gift for my younger brother's and my dad. =)

Reviews.Title: Scam
Reviews.Author: PB111
Reviews.Content: It was a used code! Don't use this person. The card was used, SCAM! I will never use them again.

Reviews.Title: Nice Product With Good Service.
Reviews.Author: prelich01 "Phillip"
Reviews.Content: I've been very pleased with this service plan. I've had very little issues with area coverage, and I've had no issues with the phone.I've had this service plan for a half a year now, and my income has increased to where I can afford a more expensive service from a contract carrier, but I've found no reason to change do the the phone's coverage and reliability. There have been times, while driving out in the country, where the much more expensive Verizon carrier would have given my much better coverage. But those times have been too few for me to justify paying Verizon's MUCH higher price.In short, for the price, I haven't found a better deal out there with any of the other non-contract or contract cell phone service provider.

Reviews.Title: GREAT COMPANY
Reviews.Author: RICSTIR13
Reviews.Content: ORDERED ON THE 13TH AND RECEIVED IN TH 17TH VIA FED-EX. AWESOME. WILL DEAL WITH THEM AGAIN AND AGAIN. YOU SHOULD AS WELL. THANKS GUYS.ABSOLUTELY THE BEST!!!!

Reviews.Title: fast shipping
Reviews.Author: Ralph Gleason
Reviews.Content: reloaded phone with card no hassles no worries. A must for all tracfone owners I would strongly recommend this for people who use this phone for their primary phone.

Reviews.Title: Tracfone.
Reviews.Author: Schnitzel "Jeffrey A. McMillan"
Reviews.Content: Tracfone 200 minutes and 90 Days of service with this card is guaranteed by Tracfone. This is if the phone you have allows for double minutes or not.

Reviews.Title: phone card
Reviews.Author: tracy fullerton
Reviews.Content: Always receive very fast. I have never had a problem with any of the cards I have bought. Will continue to buy them.

Reviews.Title: met my needs
Reviews.Author: Jim Greene
Reviews.Content: Tracfone is an easy to use basic phone. Recommended highly for those on a tight budget. Directions for use and setup were pretty clear

Reviews.Title: Good price
Reviews.Author: Marybeth Raines
Reviews.Content: Fast service and card worked fine.  I have triple minutes on my phone so this price which is cheaper than retail actually went three times as far!

Reviews.Title: Suit our need just fine
Reviews.Author: G. Larocque
Reviews.Content: We have only had this phone & minutes for nearly a month but so far it filled our needs just fine

Reviews.Title: Price is right
Reviews.Author: Melody S.
Reviews.Content: I loved finding this online.  The best part is I saved a trip to the store. I saved the taxes and fees. And I saved a $1 on the price.

Reviews.Title: Tracfone 200 Minutes and 90 Days of Service
Reviews.Author: winston1
Reviews.Content: The Tracfone plan/cell phone triples the minutes so voila! 200 minutes becomes 600 minutes!  Great plan as an alternative to a two-year contract.

Reviews.Title: USPS lost the order Shopcelldeal made good!
Reviews.Author: David Butler
Reviews.Content: The US post office lost the card.  I was able to work with shopcell deals and they took care of me resolving the problem caused by the post office.  I highly recommend them as a reputable vendor.

Reviews.Title: Good but
Reviews.Author: Trishap
Reviews.Content: It was a good buy. Came quickly and was a ok deal. Don't know what else you can say about a minute card but it came fast and worked and was reasonably priced.

Reviews.Title: Tracfone Minutes
Reviews.Author: Carole S. Stabile
Reviews.Content: It was a gift to my daughter as she is always running out of minutes so I thought that should help with her budget since she is out of work right now because of surgery.  This is a good deal for the Tracfone and her.

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: april
Reviews.Content: Good price for what I got. So I was very happy with whati got. I would buy it again. great

Reviews.Title: Will do this again!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Dolores Roland
Reviews.Content: This was a great buy and don't have to worry about running out of minutes.Thank you so much.Will shop again.

Reviews.Title: Great Top Up card for any Tracfone phone
Reviews.Author: EC320
Reviews.Content: Nice top up card for any tracfone user. I usually get one about ever 6 weeks. Ships to you in a non-descript white envelope. I have bought three of these and consider them a good deal.

Reviews.Title: Tracfones work so well. Love them.
Reviews.Author: Linder
Reviews.Content: Love love love these phone cards.  Best idea for cell phones.  No more expensive contracts, just buy what you need.

Reviews.Title: Nonnegotiable
Reviews.Author: Deborah Plummer
Reviews.Content: Purchased item but didn't use code since its not doable on SafeLink  and tried to return it and found out that its not refundable. My fault it won't happen again. I'm sure its a good idea if  I had a Tracfone.

Reviews.Title: Tracfone
Reviews.Author: Richard Bentley
Reviews.Content: I was very happy win i fineley found a 200 minute card on amazon i am satisfide with the way i reseved my package. I will perches this agen

Reviews.Title: what a bargain!
Reviews.Author: cheryl
Reviews.Content: this sure beats my 50$ month verizon bill. for someone who is not on the cell phone all the time, this is a great way to have a cell p hone....

Reviews.Title: Its exactly what it said it was
Reviews.Author: Jeremy
Reviews.Content: I needed the tracphone minutes for my tripple minutes for life lg phone. When I added this I got 600 minutes 600 texts and 600mb data

Reviews.Title: cell phones
Reviews.Author: D. Hyatt "Doc"
Reviews.Content: Not much to say as I have used this product for several years now. Since initial activation of my first tracfone, I have never had one problem. Minutes and time always go right on with no mess up. My very first purchase of triple minutes for life has paid off well. Pretty easy to activate, even for me ;-).

Reviews.Title: Nice Product.
Reviews.Author: NiK
Reviews.Content: This is a Nice Product. This product is, as described in adv and does as it is said in adv.

Reviews.Title: will buy in stores
Reviews.Author: Artlady
Reviews.Content: Its a good deal, but we did not receive a card with a scratch off code. Our code was printed on a label and the code did not work. Lucky for me, after about a 2 hour phone call, the SECOND person I spoke with just gave me my minutes. The Tracfone people were very nice and patient  but next time I will buy from a store and not over the internet as  I'm questioning the validity of the printed code.

Reviews.Title: Best deal for Tracfone minutes, period!
Reviews.Author: Tony
Reviews.Content: Tracfone charges 39.99 plus tax for this same card. I bought this for 39.98 shipped and NO taxes or extra fees. That saved me four dollars right off the bat. It arrived very fast and as pictured without an catches. I also found a forty minute code to add with this card for the bonus plan. I'm so satisfied that I will order this same card from the same seller again the next time I need minutes.

Reviews.Title: works
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Adds minutes and time to your trac fone, what else can you say?  Best price I have seen any where.

Reviews.Title: GOOD DEAL
Reviews.Author: LaShawn
Reviews.Content: I love the triple minutes and it shipped really fast. I love the fact that I do not have to leave my house to but things like this. Thanks Amazon!!! You Rock.

Reviews.Title: Worked great
Reviews.Author: Patricia Martin
Reviews.Content: Got a great deal on this one. Even though it was a piece of paper with the code, I never had any problem installing the minutes onto my phone.

Reviews.Title: Tracfone 200 Minutes
Reviews.Author: Lois L. Mayfield
Reviews.Content: Tracfone 200 MinutesTracfone 200 Minutes and 90 days of service was a right fit.  Because it did as it was expected, and was a perfect fit with the product. Thank!

Reviews.Title: Thanks for all the good work.
Reviews.Author: richard alexa
Reviews.Content: It was quick and easy, thanks for your assistance!  I will continue to use you guys as long as it continues which I believe it will.

Reviews.Title: Came as a card with easy instructions
Reviews.Author: David C. Comptong
Reviews.Content: This came as a card and was easy to add to my phone. It arrived on time. I still have minutes left on my phone even though I need to add more time.

Reviews.Title: Frequent tracfone user purchase
Reviews.Author: M. Braxton
Reviews.Content: HAVE USED TRACPHONE FOR YEARS, PRODUCT ARRIVED IN GOOD CONDITION, EASY INSTALLATION, TRIPLE MINUTES, FOR ME A GREAT BUY, BUT I DON'T CONSTANTLY USE MY PHONE.

Reviews.Title: A bargain!
Reviews.Author: Lawrence F. Little
Reviews.Content: I got triple minutes along with the ninety days. I do not need a so called "smart phone",so this works well with the T301G.

Reviews.Title: I have been trying to contacy Tracfone re: retrieving messages but have not heard from them.  I hesitate to call them because i
Reviews.Author: corbeka
Reviews.Content: I have tried contacting re: retrieving my phone messages.  It requires a password?  LG840 is the model.  You use up time for everything you do to set it up.  I have no idea if it is a digital phone but do know I have messages waiting for me.  I finally sent an e-mail re: this matter and have not received a reply.  If I cannot use the voice mail this phone will be returned for full refund.

Reviews.Title: Card worked as advertised
Reviews.Author: OracleoftheJedi
Reviews.Content: I got minutes and 3 more months usage. It is a good deal. I recommend it to every one. Thanks

Reviews.Title: Very Economical
Reviews.Author: C. Huff
Reviews.Content: I bought this card in combination with a Tracfone LG840G attempting to save money. The card arrived on time (3 July) via priority USPS mail, but was delayed for two days because the carried decided not to deliver it. I spoke tot he postal carrier before she left our apartment complex and presented her with the parcel "attempted delivery slip." She told me I had to go to the Post Office to pick up the parcel - she did not bring it out for delivery, which is in violation of USPS policy. The vendor very commendably posted the Tracfone card "Priority Mail," but wasted money as the USPS doesn't deliver priority mail envelopes to customers. Good vendor service and good product.

Reviews.Title: perfect
Reviews.Author: Catherine Woolfork
Reviews.Content: The TRACFONE has been very beneficial in my everyday life.  It helps keep track of my number of minutes as well as the cost in this very highly expensive life in which we live.  Good way of monitoring your funds without any contracts,

Reviews.Title: it was a gift
Reviews.Author: james hilton "jimmy"
Reviews.Content: i gave this as a gift and i have not heard anylthing bad about it so i guess it is fine

Reviews.Title: Easy to activate
Reviews.Author: DeAguirre
Reviews.Content: I was a bit doubtful about buying Tracfone products on Amazon, especially at the discounted price, but it worked just fine, and added the triple minutes in less than five minutes.

Reviews.Title: Trakfone
Reviews.Author: lenore McManigal
Reviews.Content: I have used Tracfone for several years, and have several phones in that time.  I will continue using Tracfone and buy new models as they become available

Reviews.Title: Better price at store
Reviews.Author: MAF
Reviews.Content: Purchase your cards at the store or on line and use codes when activating them.  By the time you purchase a phone card via the net, you end up paying as much or more after postage.

Reviews.Title: 200 minutes
Reviews.Author: richmondpd_bosswoman
Reviews.Content: i got the card in a day or two and had no problem putting the minutes on my phone just like any other card i buy from a store except no extra fees

Reviews.Title: Greatly Appreciated
Reviews.Author: S. Plummer "Novel Afficiando"
Reviews.Content: After receiving this card applied it right away to my phone because 14 days of service was left and the result was wonderful.  Thanks to Amazon, my phone is still active.

Reviews.Title: Perfect buy.
Reviews.Author: Cassie
Reviews.Content: I chose a rating of 5 stars because this card is really a great deal. If you buy this in the store you pay a lot more for it. The minutes go on your phone very fast and if you have double minutes you're getting 400 for the price of 200 minutes.

Reviews.Title: Shipping REAlly
Reviews.Author: stif47
Reviews.Content: Okay, on four stars because of the shipping charge and it came with my other card. so they made a few more bucks on me.. It still was cheaper then pinnzoo..

Reviews.Title: pre paid card
Reviews.Author: Brenda Baca
Reviews.Content: i love having this card with all those minutes and then having double minutes extra added to the phone is a bonus

Reviews.Title: A Great Service
Reviews.Author: Royland Odell Owens "Silent Why"
Reviews.Content: Tracfone service is always great. I've had up to 400 minutes on their triple minutes phone service which gives me 1200 minutes. The 200 hundred minute card gives me 600 minutes plus 90 days of service as the 400 minute card gives me one years service along with the 1200 minutes.Customer service is always helpful and setup is easy ( you can load minutes directly from your phone, instead of dialing the 1-800 number).You should try tracfone, beats a two year very pricey commitment.

Reviews.Title: Tracfone card
Reviews.Author: Tracy L. Goodrich
Reviews.Content: I bought this card with my new tracfone that offered tripple minutes.....really great deal and will last for a time.

Reviews.Title: Worked!
Reviews.Author: Kath Owens
Reviews.Content: I bought this from shopcelldeals - their shipping is quick and the PIN code worked. I got a regular Tracphone card with a PIN code sticker stuck to the back. I was afraid it wouldn't work, but it was fine.Don't forget to check online for Tracphone bonus codes. I just got 60 extra minutes. Google "tracfone promo code."

Reviews.Title: happy with the order
Reviews.Author: Helen
Reviews.Content: This phone card is awesome triple the minutes , that's fantastic very happy with this phone card...keep up the good work !!

Reviews.Title: good value
Reviews.Author: Lisa Feinstein
Reviews.Content: easier than driving to the store and convenient to purchase online anywhere it was a good value to buy here

Reviews.Title: Great card, low price
Reviews.Author: sunset-hi-96789
Reviews.Content: The overall cost was lower than my local Wal-Mart. Card worked as advertised. Would recommend to a friend. Would buy again. I am also interested in a 60 min card purchase if the price and shipping is right. Thanks for listing.

Reviews.Title: 200 MINUTES
Reviews.Author: Jeanette Thompson
Reviews.Content: The 200 min. card has worked well for us since we can get double minutes with it. We recommend it if you don't need a lot of minutes.

Reviews.Title: Issues with pin
Reviews.Author: DAVE
Reviews.Content: The pin did not work. I had to call  CS in some far away land. YOU know what that is like.In the end I got my minutes.

Reviews.Title: Best deal going!
Reviews.Author: James T Houston
Reviews.Content: I purchased my Tracfone with "lifetime" triple minutes, so each time I buy a 200 minute card, I get 600 minutes of 'talk time'...comes out to about 5 cents per minute!

Reviews.Title: Good Value Card
Reviews.Author: jarody
Reviews.Content: Received card as advertised.  No problems adding minutes to phone with it.  Will probably buy another one in the future.  Thanks!

Reviews.Title: It worked !
Reviews.Author: raymick123
Reviews.Content: It worked ! I didn't have no problem with it. Bottomline if they sell through Tracfone and Tracfone fine with it, then I'm fine with it.

Reviews.Title: Really good deal, esp. with triple minutes
Reviews.Author: James L. Strong "max4urmoney"
Reviews.Content: I work in the states for 3 months at a time and need a phone for the time I am here. Got 600 minutes and 6 months of service and Samsung slider phone for $60. Not a bad deal at all, I don't use the phone that much,and probably will list on Craigslist, when I am done. All said and done, I may get "use' this phone for little out of pocket. My work can contact me and I get to make important calls for next to nothing compared with other plans or I may keep the phone, let my son use the minutes and have the phone for the next visit and pay for another card.

Reviews.Title: Great deal
Reviews.Author: Keil Dragone
Reviews.Content: I usually just buy cards at the store but this was a savings I couldn't pass up.Would do it again when my 90 days are up

Reviews.Title: Easy to use add on airtime
Reviews.Author: Jon
Reviews.Content: No dislikes with this product at all. Took me no more than 3 minutes to download airtime on my TracFone cell phone & plus , cheaper than buying at other stores!

Reviews.Title: time card
Reviews.Author: huxy
Reviews.Content: I saved 5$ buying this card on Amazon, and there was no problem activating it. I will buy my next time card this way.

Reviews.Title: Loved the easiness
Reviews.Author: chut
Reviews.Content: Just love the easiness of using the Trafone Minutes on my new tracfone LG800g with triple minutes.Sure comes in handy and is so economical for me.

Reviews.Title: Best christmas present!
Reviews.Author: Melodizzy
Reviews.Content: Love that I could buy and  ship this to my dad for Christmas, he has a prepaid phone and when he's low on minutes I don't hear from him as much. Will keep buying from this seller!

Reviews.Title: 200 mins
Reviews.Author: KrazyTracy
Reviews.Content: received super fast  code was printed on a sticker and  stuck to a piece of paper  was expecting the actual  card

Reviews.Title: Good Deal
Reviews.Author: Amy Starr
Reviews.Content: The 200 minute purchase was delivered to my house, via USPS,  within the 1 - 3 day timeframe quoted by the seller.  As others have pointed out, rather than a Minutes Card, the seller mails a piece of paper containing the PIN number and instructions.  I have no issue with that process, and readily loaded the minutes into my phone.This is the best price I found for the 200-minute card, considering you don't have to pay any taxes or fees as you would through TracFone or a retailer.  Alas, this will change for Massachusetts buyers in October 2013 because our governor and Amazon struck an agreement whereby the state's .065% tax will apply to our Amazon purchases as of that date.

Reviews.Title: I'll be getting another order of this service, if it is still available.
Reviews.Author: Donni
Reviews.Content: After some searching and researching, I found this phone card to be  a bargain for me.  I'll be getting more of these in the future.  I hope they stay available.

Reviews.Title: Best Deal
Reviews.Author: Karen I Counterman
Reviews.Content: This was a great deal, and I plan to buy again if possible.  Tracfone is the best deal on wireless phones.  They have the lastest phones, and their plans are the best price is you do not use your phone 24/7

Reviews.Title: It worked
Reviews.Author: Mystery Writer "Mercedes"
Reviews.Content: When I loaded the minutes it gave me three times the amount of minutes because I bought the phone.So, it does what it said it would do. 3X the minutes for the life of the phone, and it also added days at the end.

Reviews.Title: As prescribed
Reviews.Author: Anthony
Reviews.Content: I bought these phone minutes and they came as I thought, with the pin code in a letter, I put the pin code in and it gave me my minutes in an instant. Good Buy.

Reviews.Title: I like the 200 minutes
Reviews.Author: Betty~Boop
Reviews.Content: I love being able to buy 200 minutes at a time.  My phone comes with triple minutes for life so when you buy a 200 minutes, you get 600.I like not having the big old T-Mobile bill coming in every month with all those little hidden charges they surprise you with.Perfectly happy and recommend this.

Reviews.Title: Perfect!
Reviews.Author: KU Alumnus "KU Alumnus"
Reviews.Content: If you're new to Tracfone, you might be surprised that you'll receive a piece of paper instead of a thin plastic card (like you get in the store).  The paper will have the activation code on it (just like a plastic card will).  For me, I have a phone that tribles my minutes - so this was another 600 minutes.  I've been with Tracfone (AT&T; prepaid division) for almost 3 years now.  They just keep getting better (I don't use my cell phone much, but when I DO use it - 98% of the usage is for text messages or phone calls (I really don't have time to be on a phone to browse the internet, and a lot of the really neat features on phones today... well, I just don't have time/use for).

Reviews.Title: Great seller and fast shipper
Reviews.Author: jenssweet1
Reviews.Content: Great product and material.It was just what i ordered and am very pleased with it.Everyone, great buy. love it

Reviews.Title: Does what it states it will do
Reviews.Author: R. J. Kerr
Reviews.Content: No surprise here. It adds 200 min. & 90 days of service to your phone. I would recommend it to a friend.

Reviews.Title: Timely
Reviews.Author: P. lewis "disappointed"
Reviews.Content: This was a great buy, came right on time, had no problems loading the code onto the phone and minutes went on phone with no hitches. This came right away, was surprised at how quickly I received it. Good job t the seller would buy from them again.

Reviews.Title: zona
Reviews.Author: zona
Reviews.Content: I had absolutely no problem with this product. It came in the mail in a timely manner and installed without a hitch. I would recommend this product to anyone who owns a Tracfone.

Reviews.Title: great buy!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This was a great price for the card, especially when you have a phone that has double or triple minutes for life. Will def buy again!

Reviews.Title: Tracfone 200 Minutes & 90 days Service
Reviews.Author: BILL SHANHOLTZ
Reviews.Content: This is a great way to to hold down your expenses by paying as you go.  Good price on the minutes and 3 months additional service.

Reviews.Title: Tracfone Minutes
Reviews.Author: Velvet
Reviews.Content: Arrived quickly. I got a piece of typing paper with instructions on it and a 15 digit code. And it worked.

Reviews.Title: Excellent seller via Amazon &  ....
Reviews.Author: SirTaz "Geniebugged"
Reviews.Content: If one waits for a TracFone 'bonus' number that add an extra 30 or 40 minutes even more bang for your $$$s.  Use for a phone that already has triple minutes - therefore getting a 200 minute cards gets 600 and most recent bonus 40 [which don't triple]

Reviews.Title: Great value! Instant access.
Reviews.Author: Steven Gournay "Imagique"
Reviews.Content: This is excellent, especially if you already have double or triple minutes for life. For $32 (plus $5 shipping) I received the minutes card in a few days and immediately added the minutes, and with double minutes had 400 minutes. When you buy 60 minutes, you pay $20 on the tracfone website, $37 for 120. So for $7 more, you wind up getting 200 minutes doubled. Great deal. Will use them again.

Reviews.Title: NOT a good deal
Reviews.Author: ebnpebnp
Reviews.Content: Do the math:For the 200 minute card, you pay $33 + $5 (postage) =  $38.  You can get a genuine card from [...] for $40 and you don't have to wait for delivery.  With this offer, all you get is a sheet of paper with the PIN, not the real Tracfone card.Don't bother

Reviews.Title: mistaken purchase
Reviews.Author: Cary Henning
Reviews.Content: I bought a motorcycle cover which I love. I intended to buy two of them however due to a pop up for this 200 min. card I mistakenly bought one cover and one 200 min card. Even though I thought I cleared that purchase and had two covers before approving the purchase I was mistaken. Very missleading on Behalf of Amazon. I AM VERY DISSAPOINTED. I kept the card because I use TracPone but could have done better on price considering I paid shipping, but didnt want to deal with the hastle and possible expense of a return.I still intend to get another Kuryakan 4123 PrimoShield Cover. Amazon seems to have a great reputation and I'm confident they will work with me and make this right.

Reviews.Title: extra plus service
Reviews.Author: Charles D. Atkinson
Reviews.Content: One of the very RARE!!!! occasions when off shore custs survice was super!!! When i tried to download my double min it would not work!!! The customer service determined that when phone was purcahased (gift to Me) double minuites were included.. they fixed problem and got my new time loaded and also gave me extra minuits for my double min purchase quick, efficient and pleasant

Reviews.Title: ARE YOU KIDDING ! ! ! !
Reviews.Author: Edward Santilli
Reviews.Content: These geniuses sent me minutes thru snail mail it took two days. DUHH ! ! ! I bought minutes from Tracphone  BUT NOT Amazon and my minutes were in my phone before I could finish reading my receipt online. I went to Tracphone site instead of using Amazon. I was nuts when I relised they were "mailing"  my minutes, when everyone else simply uses the airwaves.

Reviews.Title: this is not a good plan it sucks for me
Reviews.Author: shirley hartzfield
Reviews.Content: the minutes count down very fast and if you use a half a minute it takes the whole minutes it also take minutes from you for incoming cals and all 800 numbers which with any other phone would be freee i purchased this  200 minute card with triple minites and i also bought another 60 with trile minutes giving me 780 minutes and in 14dayts the minutes have gone down so fast ive only 199 lesft  ive paid out 67.00 so far and its not worth it to me im not on the phone constant i have to limit my calls this phone card to me would only be for emergencies i got it because my phone was out of service will not use it again.

Reviews.Title: Bad service, deactivates phone.
Reviews.Author: Jarrett Oliver
Reviews.Content: I was a tracfone for 8 years.  Never had problems until now. Recently the service they provide is garbage.  Other companies are possibly hacking into their services.  Their own managers and analyzers do not know what going on.  Any phone that you hook up with them with randomly be deactivated and you'll spend hours being on hold to get it hooked back up.  It happened every day for 2 weeks.  Many others are having the same problem.  Do not purchase tracfone!!!!!!!  Think about it, I myself just lost three job interviews cause I can't get my number back.  This can happen to you!!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: When TracFone Airtime Cards Aren't: We Reap What We Sow!
Reviews.Author: Holy Shirt
Reviews.Content: That over 75% of respondents openly and happily believe tax evasion like this is a "good deal" reveals why the United States economy falls deeper into the abyss daily.  I buy airtime, via retail purchases of real cards, because the taxes collected to some extent keeps our economy alive, if not healthily so.  Do you prefer sending your money to (for all you know) organizations actively involved in exporting terrorism to your own backyard?History is full of people, whose motivations were not understood by the masses, locked up for being "insane."  21st-century America is infested by people (you know who you are) conditioned to believe the crime of tax evasion must be a "good value" because "everybody does it."  Collectively, the DUMBTH of this herd-mentality has ground our economy nearly to a standstill.  Amazon DOES offer good values on items not available everywhere.  PINheads buy 'Virtual Airtime' cards.  They may be penny-wise, but are pound-foolish.  Electronic retailers that permit false images to appear on their marketing websites should be prosecuted.  Deceptive marketing is okay?  I think not!

Reviews.Title: VERY GOOD
Reviews.Author: HARVEY LEVINSKY
Reviews.Content: I FOUND THIS TO BE A VERY GOOD PURCHASE,  MY PHONE HAD MINUTES LEFT ON IT AND I ENDED UP WITH OVER 1000 MINUTES TOTEL TO USE UP

ProductInfo.Name: Tracfone 200 Minutes and 90 Days of Service
